description: Replace DELIVERABLES.md with workorder.md - human-friendly quick reference format. Shows new files, changes, what/why/how summaries, file references, tables/lists for quick scanning. Designed for rapid human comprehension of workorder outcomes.
notes: workorder.md format: ## What Changed (files list), ## Why (business reason), ## How (technical approach), ## New Files (table with purpose), ## Modified Files (table with changes), ## Quick Reference (key decisions, gotchas). Focus: scannable, high signal-to-noise ratio.
